ЁЯСС
Ascension: Rise to Power

The first 'Maharajadhiraja' (King of Kings) of the Gupta dynasty. He initiated the 'Gupta Era' in 319-20 CE to commemorate his coronation.

ЁЯТН
Marriage Alliance

Married 'Kumaradevi', a princess of the Lichchavi clan, which enhanced the political prestige and power of the Guptas. Samudragupta, his son, referred to himself as 'Lichchavi-dauhitra' (grandson of the Lichchavis).

ЁЯкЩ
Coins

He issued gold coins of the 'King and Queen' type, depicting Chandragupta and Kumaradevi.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Maharajadhiraja.
  • Gupta Era: 319-320 CE.
  • Capital: Pataliputra (probable).
  • Significance: Considered the true founder of the Gupta Empire.
